CREATE TABLE customer_reports (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    preference VARCHAR(50),
    buying_behavior VARCHAR(50)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customer_reports SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;

)

)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,

)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id SET customers.customer_name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE purchases.product_name = 'Product X';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  purchase_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  income DECIMAL(15, 2),
  occupation VARCHAR(50),
  education_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  preference_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  report_type VARCHAR(50),
  generated_date TIMESTAMP,
  report_content JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 'b4536ecf-1c5d-4dab-a63e-7401153144fb';
